attributes.action: Provide a rebate on stamp duty on all houses (existing & new) that are fitted with renewables and are energy efficient.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown recently announced that new houses that were deemed zero carbon would, for a limited period, be exempt from stamp duty (up to houses of less than £500,000). This is just a gimmick to appear to be attempting to reduce CO2 emissions. If we are to seriously tackle CO2 emissions all 25 million existing homes should be have some stamp duty rebate as an incentive.
